uk.ac.aber.dcs.slj11.wordplay.datastruct
Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.aber.dcs.slj11.wordplay.datastruct.Graph

public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object

Data structure to represent the graph of a set of words of the same length.

Author:
Samuel Jackson (slj11@aber.ac.uk)
